roleset.name: asking price

example.name: NP only, Args 0, 2 & 3
example.text: The charge on loans to depository institutions by the New York Federal Reserve Bank
example.arg: by the New York Federal Reserve Bank

example.name: Args 0 & 2
example.text: They submitted their charges to customers at the end of each month.

roleset.note: Roleset based on verb entry charge.01, OntoNotes grouping charge-n sense 3; maps to VN class bill-54.5. Framed by Claire.

example.name: Arg 3 only
example.text: Admission charges at movie theaters have been going up recently.

example.name: Args 0, 1, 3
example.text: Their charge of £14 (£13,95) for breakfast is extortionate.

roleset.name: walk quickly

example.name: Arg 0 only
example.text: The wrestler's charge carried him past his adversary.

example.name: All arguments
example.text: The offensive charge of the field gained their football team 22 yards in the last play.

roleset.note: Roleset based on verb entry charge.02, OntoNotes grouping charge-n sense 5; maps to VN class run-51.3.2. Framed by Claire.

roleset.name: assign a role, charge with a responsibility

example.name: Fragment, Args 0 & 2
example.text: its largely successful defense of antitrust charges by the United States Football League
example.arg: by the United States Football League

example.name: Args 0 & 1
example.text: The judge's charge to the jury was to ignore the preceding statement of the witness.

roleset.note: Roleset based on verb entry charge.05, OntoNotes grouping charge-n senses 4 & 6; maps to VN class equip-13.4.2. Framed by Claire.

example.name: Args 1 & 2
example.text: The spy fulfilled his charge of smuggling fissile materials into the country.

roleset.name: nomlike

roles.note: Syntax and semantics of this roleset differ slightly from charge.03, keep in mind that this is an utterance event and it's an accusation rather than a formal charge.

example.name: autogen1
example.text: The newspaper published charges that the attorney had tried to bribe members of the jury.
example.arg: that the attorney had tried to bribe members of the jury.

example.name: autogen2
example.text: House Speaker Nancy Pelosi said Friday she won't talk any more about her charge that the CIA lied in 2002 about using waterboarding.
example.arg: that the CIA lied in 2002 about using waterboarding.

roleset.note: Roleset based on verb entry charge.06, OntoNotes grouping charge-n sense 3; no relevant mapping to VN. Framed by Claire.

roleset.name: buy on credit
roleset.note: Roleset based on verb entry charge.04, OntoNotes grouping charge-n sense 14; no relevant mapping to VN. Framed by Claire.

example.name: All arguments
example.text: Mary's charge of the dress on her old credit card would not go through.

example.name: Args 1 & 2
example.text: The charge of $900 dollars of merchandise to his father's credit card got John into big trouble.
